name: St Helens Marriage Index
description: An online database of marriage in the St Helens area between 1536 & 2010. Built using React and Azure technologies the site takes years of historical records and makes it easy & fast to search through them.

name: Homeflix
description: A clone of Netflix using React JS, Azure Cosmos DB & Azure Functions. The app has full authentication using JWT & encryption for security and allows a use to search & play videos held within the library.

name: Refinitiv
description: Product manager responsibility for 5 local languages versions of Refinitiv.com. The project involved working with local marketing teams, translation agencies & the Adobe platform to expand the reach of marketing across the globe. After site build, my role shifted to increasing SEO performance through various on-site optimisations.

name: Emirates Paid Search
description: A short term project to help Emirates Airlines acquire extra customers for their holiday & travel agent business. The project happened over a short 3 month period with total ad spend of $1.2m with a total ROI of 4.2 achieved using real-time bidding strategies and linking to an inventory feed direct from Emirates to ensure bidding was optimal.

name: Google Tag Manager
description: At Latitude Digital Marketing in Dubai my role involved managing the implementation of Google Tag Manager on behalf of clients in the region. This involved working with clients development/engineering teams to deploy the container & then to configure GTM to capture the variables & data that clients required.

name: Thomson Reuters MENA
description: Responsible for the build and deployment of a local version of the main Thomson Reuters site in the MENA region. The project involved a migration from an old Wordpress site, migration & build using Adobe and the decomissioning of the old WordPress website.

name: Re-a11y
description: A website to host content about accessibility & perform basic accessibility tests on an url. The site makes use of Azure Functions to scan a given url & return the most important issues of any given url.

name: Notion News
description: A small news website built using NextJS and powered by Notion as a pseudo CMS. The app uses NextJS and server side rendering to display news articles that are stored in Notion and accessed through the Notion client. A simple Bootstrap implementation is used for styling with Sass for customisation.

name: Mappin
description: App to store locations of where a user has travelled to using the MapBox API. The app has server powered by ExpressJS and uses Mongoose to connec to MongoDB with user registration & login functionality. On the client side, React is used to show a Single Page App, Axios is used to interact with the server & Material UI is used to style the app.
